en: It hits you while you're working: you really haven't had time for fun this month. The things that used to take up your time - TV, friends, hobbies - have fallen away in favor of your overall goal. Is this a good thing, or should you make time for fun?
You make some time to do something for pure fun, and it completely refreshes you. There's more to life than work.
There will be time for fun when you've truly established yourself.
